member.name: T:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper
member.summary: Provides helper methods for working with hierarchical items.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.FlattenVisible``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Flattens a hierarchical collection into a single enumerable, respecting expand/collapse state.
member.returns: An enumerable of all visible items in tree order.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.FlattenAll``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Flattens a hierarchical collection into a single enumerable, including all items regardless of expand state.
member.returns: An enumerable of all items in tree order.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.Find``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Finds an item in the hierarchy by reference.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.GetVisibleIndex``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},``0)
member.summary: Gets the index of an item within the flattened visible list.
member.param: The item to find the index of.
member.returns: The 0-based index of the item, or -1 if not found or not visible.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.GetItemAtVisibleIndex``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the item at a specific index in the flattened visible list.
member.returns: The item at the specified index, or if index is out of range.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.CountVisible``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Counts the total number of visible items in the hierarchy.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.GetRoot``1(``0)
member.summary: Gets the root ancestor of an item.
member.param: The item to find the root of.
member.returns: The root ancestor, or the item itself if it has no parent.

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.GetAncestorPath``1(``0)
member.summary: Builds the ancestor chain from root to the specified item.
member.param: The item to build the path for.
member.returns: A list of ancestors from root to the item (inclusive).

member.name: M:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.HierarchyHelper.EnsureVisible``1(``0)
member.summary: Ensures all ancestors of an item are expanded so the item is visible.

member.summary: Defines a hierarchical item that can have a parent and children, enabling tree-like structures.
member.typeparam: The type of the hierarchical item, which must implement this interface.

member.summary: Gets or sets the parent of this item, or if this is a root item.

member.name: P:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.IHierarchicalItem`1.Children
member.summary: Gets the children of this item.

member.name: P:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.IHierarchicalItem`1.CanHaveChildren
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this item can contain children.

member.name: P:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.IHierarchicalItem`1.ShowChildrenInHierarchy
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether children should be displayed in the hierarchy UI. When , children exist but are hidden from the tree view.

member.name: P:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.IHierarchicalItem`1.IsExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this item's children are expanded in the UI. Only meaningful when and are .

member.name: P:SadConsole.ImGuiSystem.IHierarchicalItem`1.Depth
member.summary: Gets the depth of this item in the hierarchy (0 for root items).
